name: detect-it
description: Detect if a device is mouse only, touch only, or hybrid

scripts.dev: npm link && npm run watch && npm unlink
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && trap 'exit 0' SIGINT; microbundle watch --format esm,cjs --no-compress --strict & microbundle watch --format umd --compress --strict --external peerDependencies
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && microbundle build --format esm,cjs --no-compress --strict && microbundle build --format umd --compress --strict --external peerDependencies

author: Rafael Pedicini <rafael@rafgraph.dev>
